com.yantra.yfc.log

Class YFCLevelMatchFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.log4j.spi.Filter
      • com.yantra.yfc.log.YFCLevelMatchFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.log4j.spi.OptionHandler

    public class YFCLevelMatchFilter
extends org.apache.log4j.spi.Filter

    This class is a extension of LevelMatchFilter available in the log4j configuration file.

    The filter admits two options LevelToMatch and AcceptOnMatch. If there is an exact match between the value of the LevelToMatch option and the level of the LoggingEvent, then the decide(LoggingEvent event) method returns Filter.ACCEPT in case the AcceptOnMatch option value is set to true, if it is false then Filter.DENY is returned. If there is no match, Filter.NEUTRAL is returned.

      • decide

        public int decide(org.apache.log4j.spi.LoggingEvent event)

        The decide method returns the decision of this filter. The method returns FILTER.NEUTRAL if the LevelToMatch option is not set or if there is not a match. When there is a match the returned decision is FILTER.ACCEPT if the AcceptOnMatch property is set to true. The returned decision is FILTER.DENY if the AcceptOnMatch property is set to false.

        event The LoggingEvent to decide upon. The decision of the filter.
        Specified by:
        decide in class org.apache.log4j.spi.Filter
